description: Mediabridge 3.5mm Female to 2-Male RCA Y-AdapterMediabridge's 3.5mm Female to 2-Male RCA adapter is ideal for connecting Smartphones, MP3 players or CD players to your stereo receiver or speakers. This adapter is intended to be used with a 3.5mm Male to 3.5mm Male stereo audio cable (sold separately).Product Features- 3.5mm Female connector on one end, & 2 Male RCA connectors on the other end- Dual-shielded with high-quality polished metal connectors- Ideal for connecting Smartphones, MP3 players & CD players to stereo receivers or speakers- Cable is 8IN in lengthCompatibility- The 3.5mm Female connector is intended for a Smartphone (iPhone), MP3 player (iPod), CD player, or other 3.5mm-enabled device- The 2-Male RCA connectors are meant for stereo receivers or speakersInstallationUsing existing cables, connect a Smartphone, MP3 player or CD player to the 3.5mm Female connector, & then connect the 2-Male RCA connectors to a stereo receiver or speakerWarrantyLimited 1 Year WarrantySupportCall us Mon-Sat 9AM-6PM Eastern (extended hours Tue/Thu until 9PM). Emails answered within 1 business day
title: Mediabridge 3.5mm Female to 2-Male RCA Y-Adapter (8 Inches)
